paper_abstract: We present a cavitation model based on the Stokes equation and formulate adaptive finite element methods for its numerical solution. A posteriori error estimates and adaptive algorithms are derived, and numerical examples illustrating the theory are supplied, in particular with comparison to the simplified Reynolds model of lubrication. Copyright (C) 2010 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: A Stokes model with cavitation for the numerical simulation of hydrodynamic lubrication
